title: The box "Delete Cookies and Site Data when Firefox is closed" becomes unchecked every time I quit Firefox.
content: The box "Delete Cookies and Site Data when Firefox is closed" becomes unchecked every time I quit Firefox. Is there a way to be sure that it stays checked so that I don't have to open preferences every time I open Firefox?

title: I had to get Firefox because Windows does not do screenshots. I do NOT want to be synced to Windows, they're the problem!
content:
My pc crashed about a month ago. We all know how screwed up Windows is, hence Firefox. Something changed in the past week & it was NONE of my doing. Once I get this crap working right, I leave it alone. Of course, I have Bing/MS because it's required to have MANY browsers since not one can do it all. I use Bing/MS mostly, I only ever had Firefox because they know what a screenshot is. I don't use it for much else because it's slow as hell. Here I am tonight, 1:45 a.m., trying to do my screenshots. Windows has changed the settings & how I operate. I have NOT synced ANY of my laptop stuff to them because they'll fu-- it up. That's the only thing THEY'RE good for, you can count on it.

1. I take the screenshot. 2. I go up to the top bar & click the folder. 3. I rename the file. (png to jpg, NOT a deal breaker.) 4. Now after taking 5 shots, the download folder is automatically retaining the original screenshot as well as the renamed one, so I'm having to do manual deletions.

Since I've been doing thousands of screenshots in the last 7 months, it's been going great (other than the freaking MS/Bing crashing my pc). Of course, why would it keep going smoothly when my damn deadline is coming up? I HATE WINDOWS & MS. Meanwhile, I have to keep doing double work, lather, rinse, repeat, etc. from the above-mentioned pains in the ass. Also, that automatic adding of the png after I manually change it to jpg is another pain in the ass.

I will elaborate on the deadline because I don't have time to waste. I'm having to do my testimonies as Dying Declarations because I won't live long enough for the trials due to a brain tumor. I'm sure that is adding to my thinking skills as it is. I can barely write or talk anymore, thank God I can still type. Gmail's a useless product as well, but if anyone can offer a simpler way for me to get the screenshots done, disable those pains in the ass, please email me. I would have attached a few of the screenshots to show you, but I don't have time to edit them, delete my personal info, etc. I'll check back later in the day. Thank you.

PS When I clicked share data, the first thing I see is MS defender. I'm assuming that's the fu-up, not sure. I certainly did not CHOOSE it.
creator: seniorlife171

title: icon on taskar
content: I have latest version firefox on windows 10 pro firefox was pinned to taskbar, but since yesterday the icon is not showing anymore tried unpin - pin again even opening firefox from start without being pinned does not show the icon this is the only program having this problem I tried all windows suggestions but still the same best regards, Guy
creator: przytula

title: Stop Firefox making tabs go to sleep?
content:
Had Firefox 9x or so installed on my mac and then updated to 101. Now tabs go to sleep, unloads. So videos paused and the timer reset, webmail have to login again and again. If saving websites temporary in tabs now can change after article/sites get updated.

Setting "browser.tabs.unloadOnLowMemory" to false do not work. Tabs still go to sleep with the "ZZZZ". Have tried to restart Firefox and reboot computer.

Tried to install older version of Firefox but then it complain about compatibility with the old "settings files", so have to make a clean install then... Possible to force this? Change what version the "settings files" are so older version of firefox dont complain?
creator: Hepp

title: Amazon Seller Central
content:
Hi all,

since the last firefox update I am not able to visit the german Amazon Seller Central website anymore. I have no knowlegde in how to solve this issue and that is why I am asking for your support.

The link to the website is: https://sellercentral.amazon.de/ Whenever I want to visit the site, I get the error "HTTP Status 400 – Bad Request" (see attached image).

I already checked with amazon themselves, but they said the issue lies within my computer. My IT department said the issue is related to the browser most likely; and indeed, with Microsoft Edge for example, I am able to open the website.

Does anyone know this error and even better knows how to solve the problem?

Thanks in advance!
creator: gerraythebrain

Sin embargo, cuando entro como ventana "privada" sí me funciona. Os diría las extensiones que tengo, pero no sé si será alguna de ellas (media docena tengo instaladas) ¿Cómo puedo solucionarlo? title: always use Private Browsing not recognized
content:
A few days ago, I tried to have one window for private mode and one for public. For Private mode, I used settings for custom history and Always use Private browsing Mode. Somehow, it didn't work. I'm old and forget a lot of what I did. I reinstalled FF a few times, to no avail. So did uninstall and told them why, and that I planned to be back in a few days. Also, I uninstalled the Maintenance program first. I went to EDGE, but really hate it, so I downloaded FF now. Set for Private browsing. But it doesn't work. Keep getting public browsing. Even if I select it on taskbar icon, no luck. Don't see the purple glasses or whatever they were. I really like to use private mode.

I can sure use some advice.
